info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:28PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...North Carolina... Dan River near Danville affecting Pittsylvania, Caswell, and Rockingham Counties, as well as the City of Danville. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at Paces. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low spots along routes 658 and 671 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 24.2 feet by Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM EST.
